profile_positions.description:
I provide technical assistance to companies and (non-)governmental organizations involved in agricultural value chains, including cacao, coffee, natural ingredients, fruit and vegetables in the form of:
*Market analysis
*Program design and policy recommendations
*Market access guidance: market entry strategies, matchmaking, market access requirements
*Capacity development: trainings, webinars, guides

Currently looking into:
*Opportunities for cocoa derivatives on the European market
*Successful business models for roasted-at-origin coffee
*Successful branding and marketing techniques for natural ingredients
*Ecuadorian and Colombian cacao
*Amazonian products
profile_positions.title: International Trade and Sustainable Development

profile_positions.description: I've been supporting the Swiss Import Promotion Programme (SIPPO) in capacity-building trajectories of several Business Support Organizations (BSOs) across the processed food and natural ingredient sectors in: Serbia, North Macedonia, South Africa, Peru, Colombia, Tunisia and Albania.

profile_positions.description:
Research on Transboundary River Basin Management in the Amazon (Brazil-Peru-Bolivia border):
*Evaluating the establishment of a tri-national management structure for the Acre River basin.
*Interviewing the main stakeholders involved in the management of the Acre River basin in Brazil, Peru and Bolivia.
*Compiling a report containing the main findings and conclusions stemming from interviews and secondary sources.
